entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
